title: IDisplayDimension.GetSupportsGenericText
description: Gets whether the display dimension was created in SOLIDWORKS 2011 or later, which, if so, indicates that the display dimension is generic text.
returns: True if the display dimension was created in SOLIDWORKS 2011 or later and is generic text, false if the display dimension was created in an earlier release of SOLIDWORKS and is dimension text
